DOCNAME: CASE OF IORDANIS IORDANOU v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property;Violation of Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life
JUDGES: David Thór Björgvinsson;Ján Šikuta;Lech Garlicki;Nicolas Bratza;Päivi Hirvelä
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . The applicant stated that he was born in ORG , a village on the coast in the GPE district of northern GPE . On the death of his father , he inherited the house , located at CARDINAL , FAC , in which he had lived throughout his childhood . It was situated on plots nos . CARDINAL and CARDINAL , sheet / plan ORG and CARDINALWCARDINAL , and was registered in the name of the applicant by virtue of registration no . CARDINAL of DATE ; it consisted of CARDINAL ground floor rooms , CARDINAL basement rooms , CARDINAL kitchen , CARDINAL wells , CARDINAL turbine water pump and CARDINAL water storage tank . The applicant continued to make use of this house , where his sister lived , until DATE .

CARDINAL . NORP However , when he married in DATE , the applicant moved to a house nearby which he had purchased . It was situated on plots CARDINAL . CARDINAL and DATE , sheet / plan XI/CARDINALWCARDINAL.ECARDINAL , and was registered in the name of the applicant by virtue of registration no . CARDINAL of DATE . This second house , located at CARDINAL , FAC , consisted of CARDINAL ground floor rooms , CARDINAL room upstairs , CARDINAL wells , CARDINAL electric water pump and CARDINAL water storage pump .

CARDINAL . The applicant also owned CARDINAL plots of land in ORG , some of which were lemon groves , with olive and carob trees growing on the others , and a share in a natural water DATE . These properties were registered as follows :
( a ) plot no . CARDINAL , sheet / plan ORG , field with lemon groves of a total extent of CARDINAL ORG , registered in the name of the applicant by virtue of registration no . CARDINAL of DATE ;

( b ) plot no . DATE , sheet / plan ORG , field with carob and olive trees of a total extent of CARDINAL m² , registered in the name of the applicant by virtue of registration no . CARDINAL of CARDINAL DATE ;

( c ) plots nos . DATE and DATE , sheet / plan ORG , field with carob and olive trees of a total extent of CARDINAL m² , registered in the name of the applicant by virtue of registration no . CARDINAL of DATE ;
( d ) plot no . CARDINAL , sheet / plan ORG , source of running water , registered for the CARDINAL share in the name of the applicant .

CARDINAL . NORP In support of his claim to ownership the applicant produced the original Land Certificates concerning each of his alleged properties , with the exception of the house described under paragraph CARDINAL above . He alleged that the relevant ORG had been submitted to ORG for amendment in DATE and had been lost due to the NORP invasion . He therefore produced an extract from the registries of GPE , dated DATE , and indicating that the property at issue was registered in his name .

CARDINAL . Upon the DATE NORP intervention , the applicant left with his wife and QUANTITY children for GPE , southern GPE . He claimed that he had been deprived of his property rights , all his property being located in the area which was under the occupation and control of the NORP military authorities . The latter had prevented him from having access to and from using and possessing his houses and fields .
